definition: variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
surname Piao/Korean surname (Park, Pak, or Bak)/also pr. [Pu2]

sentences.english: I love the simplicity of a small design change for a big impact.
sentences.chinese: 我就是喜欢那种小变化大影响而带来的纯朴。

sentences.english: And in their primitivity and innocence, they value what they thus immediately apprehend.
sentences.chinese: 他们纯朴而天真，珍贵他们如此直接领悟的东西。

sentences.english: Whether it is simple or modern, it will be charged bu someone at the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 无论是纯朴还是现代，入口处都会有人在收取费用。

sentences.english: The festival traditional customs preserve pure and simple belief and witchery ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 其传统习俗保留着纯朴的信仰观念与远古的仪式。

sentences.english: My dear friends, You must be inspired by the beautiful scenes and the natural folkway in Daocheng county.
sentences.chinese: 您一定被稻城美丽的风光和纯朴的民风所感染了。

sentences.english: He had the gift of simple and moving expression.
sentences.chinese: 他有一种表情纯朴而动人的秉赋。

sentences.english: The innocence and unsophistication of younger ideals had gone.
sentences.chinese: 青年期的天真纯朴的理想是已经过去的了。

sentences.english: Shangrao had nice scenery with hills and waters and unaffected folk customs.
sentences.chinese: 上饶有美丽的山水与纯朴的民风民俗。

sentences.english: Yet even the virtuous Norwegians have been raiding it for politically popular causes.
sentences.chinese: 然而即使是纯朴的挪威人也将其赋予了政治条款。

sentences.english: Hakka people are very passinate and their folkway is honest.
sentences.chinese: 客家人非常好客，民风纯朴。

sentences.english: You must be inspired by the beautiful scenes and the natural folkway in Daocheng county.
sentences.chinese: 您一定被稻城美丽的风光和纯朴的民风所感染了。

sentences.english: There was something simple, sincere in that voice.
sentences.chinese: 那声音里有种纯朴真诚的东西。

sentences.english: Yaoli is surely a place of honesty and plain living.
sentences.chinese: 瑶里果然是一个民风纯朴的地方。

sentences.english: I liked the simple, wild grandeur of the palisades.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢它那纯朴而又宏伟的峭壁。

definition: hospitality/to treat guests well/to enjoy having guests/hospitable/friendly
quiet and contented/indifferent to fame or gain
